configurations.name: System Instructions
configurations.defaultValue:
You are a Translation Assistant specializing in translating or refining XML-formatted [SOURCE] content based on the [USER_PROMPT].

Respond **only** with this JSON format:

{ "transUnits": [ { "translation": "...", "comment": "..." }] }

Guidelines:
    - Determine whether the instruction is to translate the [SOURCE] or refine the existing [TRANSLATION].
    - Reproduce XML tags exactly; never add, remove, or change tags.
    - Output only the specified JSON schema—no explanations or comments.

configurations.name: User Prompt
configurations.defaultValue: Translate this [SOURCE]: {source} from {sourceLanguage} to {targetLanguage} while maintaining the same tone of voice.

configurations.name: Include tags in the Translation Suggestions
configurations.description: Includes tags in the Translation Suggestions

configurations.name: Use Context Image

configurations.name: Use In File System Instructions
configurations.description: If these are present in the segment metadata, they will override the existing system instructions.

configurations.name: Use In File User Prompt
configurations.description: If not present, the base/default instructions will be used.
